source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_00<tab>Stephanivien would ask you to gather your colleagues for the tourney.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_00<tab>スカイスチール機工房のステファニヴィアンは、模擬戦に向けて作戦会議をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_01<tab>Stephanivien, exultant that the day of the tourney is at hand, would have you call your colleagues back to the manufactory. Head outside the workshop, and speak with Joye.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_01<tab>ステファニヴィアンは、模擬戦の作戦会議を開くという。スカイスチール機工房付近の「ジョイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_02<tab>You approach Joye, only to find her frantic at the discovery of a crate full of broken firearms. After you soothe her panic somewhat, she is able to tell you where Rostnsthal is to be found. Head towards the other side of the workshop, and seek out the master of marksmanship.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_02<tab>ジョイと話した。聖レネット広場付近の「ロスティンスタル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_03<tab>Rostnsthal is furious to hear of the smashed weapons, and bids you scour the area around the manufactory for the culprit's accomplices. Search Foundation for lingering miscreants, and scare them away using Gauss Round.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_03<tab>ロスティンスタルと話した。イシュガルド下層の「不審者」に「ガウスラウンド」をしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_04<tab>You encounter three potential troublemakers, and warn them off with your frighteningly accurate marksmanship. Return to the manufactory and report to Stephanivien.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_04<tab>イシュガルド下層の不審者を片付けた。スカイスチール機工房の「ステファニヴィアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_05<tab>No sooner have you described your encounters to Stephanivien when a nearby explosion rocks the workshop. Head outside and speak with Joye.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_05<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話していたところ、爆発音がした。イシュガルド下層の「ジョイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_06<tab>Joye mournfully shares her discovery of the destroyed turrets, but it seems that Stephanivien is not yet ready to surrender House Haillenarte's place in the tourney. The chief machinist vows to replace the damaged weaponry, and sends your colleagues ahead to put on a show of confidence. Join Stephanivien in the manufactory, and discuss what must be done to overcome this latest disaster.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_06<tab>ジョイと話した。スカイスチール機工房の「ステファニヴィアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_07<tab>In the face of repeated attacks against the workshop and your dwindling chances of success, Stephanivien finds himself ever more dependent upon the brilliance of a talented few─namely you and Joye. But will skill alone be enough to balance the loss of so much machinist weaponry...?
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_07<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話した。何者かの妨害のせいで、満足な準備ができないまま模擬戦に臨まなければならなくなった。模擬戦の結果は、冒険者の活躍にかかっている。アインハルト家を勝利に導くことはできるだろうか？
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_08<tab>
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_SEQ_09<tab>

TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_TODO_00<tab>ジョイと話す
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_TODO_01<tab>ロスティンスタルと話す

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_TODO_02<tab>Use Gauss Round to scare off troublemakers.
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_TODO_02<tab>不審者にガウスラウンドをする
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_TODO_03<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話す
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_TODO_04<tab>ジョイと話す
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_TODO_05<tab>ステファニヴィアンと話す

TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_000<tab>The day of the tourney is finally upon us. This is it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This is machinistry's moment of truth!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_000<tab>やあ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ついに、決戦の日がやって来たぞ。
この模擬戦の結果次第で、「機工士」の未来が決まる！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_001<tab>Pray gather our colleagues together. Joye should be just outside performing some last-moment firearm inspections, and Rostnsthal...well, Joye may have a better idea of his whereabouts than I.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_001<tab>皆を集めて、作戦会議をしたい。
ジョイは工房の外にいるから、声をかけてくれ。
指南役の居場所も、彼女が知っているだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_002<tab>Pray inform our colleagues that the moment is at hand.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_002<tab>皆を集めて、作戦会議をしたい。
ジョイは工房の外にいるから、声をかけてくれ。
指南役の居場所も、彼女が知っているだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_010<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this is a disaster! Someone has broken into our storage crates and smashed all the firearms!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様、大変です！
も、模擬戦用の銃が、軒並み壊されているんです……！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_011<tab>I-I must tell his lordship! ...No! We must check the other crates first! Or, maybe... Oooh, what do we do!?
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_011<tab>ぼっ、ぼっちゃまに報告しなくちゃ……！
い、いえ……別の場所に保管している銃が使えれば、
模擬戦では戦えますし……あわわわ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_012<tab>...Aye, you're right, of course. Givin' in to panic won't help us none. I'll see what's become of the rest of the weapons, then report me findings to his lordship.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_012<tab>はっ、さすがは<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>様です……。
確かに、こんな時こそ落ち着かなければなりませんね。
まずは予備の銃を確認して、ぼっちゃまに報告します！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_013<tab>Rostnsthal? Last I saw, he was gettin' some fresh air out behind the workshop.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_013<tab>……指南役の居場所ですか？
先ほど「聖レネット広場」のほうに、歩いていかれましたよ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_020<tab>Don't look now, <var 08 E905 ((lassie)) ((lad)) /var>, but I think we've got visitors again. Stubborn bastards...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、いいところに来た。
工房の周りに、また不審者が現れている。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_021<tab>...Eh!? Smashed up our firearms, ye say!? Seems whatever scrag it is as wants us gone is done with bein' subtle.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_021<tab>なに、模擬戦用の銃が壊されてただと……！？
どこのどいつか知らんが、「機工士」を潰したい奴らが、
なりふり構わず動き出したか。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_022<tab>We'd best run off the rest o' these thugs afore they decide to set fire to the place.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_022<tab>不審者を残らず排除したほうがよさそうだ。
お前は、工房の周りをひととおり見回ってみてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_023<tab>Ye know what to do: warning Gauss Rounds only so's we don't bring the wrath o' the Temple Knights down upon us. Meet me back in the workshop when yer done with yer patrol.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_023<tab>不審な輩がいたら、「ガウスラウンド」を使って追っ払え。
それが終わったら、工房に集合だ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703A_000_030<tab>Hm hm hm. The timin' has to be perfect...
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703A_000_030<tab>ここなら、人目もすくなそうだ、ケケケ。
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703A_000_035<tab>……ぎゃ！　みつかったか！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703B_000_030<tab>'Tis naught personal, Haillenarte, but coin is coin...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703B_000_030<tab>「機工士」に恨みはないが……
うまくいけば、金が手に入るんだ……。
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703B_000_035<tab>ぐはっ！　オ、俺は何も悪くない！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703C_000_030<tab>Just wait until no one is lookin'...
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703C_000_030<tab>誰も見ていないな……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703C_000_035<tab>...Ah! That purse ain't worth gettin' shot at!
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_PROWLER01703C_000_035<tab>くそっ、ここでつかまってたまるか！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, are you quite all right? Our fine instructor here tells me you've both been busy chasing off hired miscreants again.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_040<tab>お帰り、無事だったかな？
指南役が、不審者を山ほど片付けてくれたそうだけど……。
君も、だいぶ不審者を片付けてくれたようだね。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_041<tab>(-Joye-)I'm afraid the damage has already been done, me lordship. Even after scrapin' together our spares, we've less than half the weapons we need for the tourney...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_041<tab>(-ジョイ-)……ですが、模擬戦用の銃が破壊されてしまいました。
予備をかき集めても、必要数の半分も用意できません。
このままでは、模擬戦への参加は不可能です……。
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_042<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_042<tab>Then half will just have to do. 'Twill be difficult, I know, but I believe we still have a chan─
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_042<tab>半分もあれば、大丈夫さ。
少しだけ厳しい戦いになるだけだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_043<tab>(-Rostnsthal-)What in the bloody 'ells was that!? Sounds like someone fired a damn cannon or summat!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_043<tab>(-ロスティンスタル-)おいおい、どえらい爆発音がしたぞ！？
様子を見に行こう！
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_049<tab>今度は、何事だ……？

TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_050<tab>ぼっちゃま……
こんどはタレットが灰に……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_051<tab>(-Rostnsthal-)Blast! We must've missed one o' the shite-eatin' bastards!
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_ROSTNSTHAL_000_051<tab>(-ロスティンスタル-)……くっ、まだ隠れ潜んでいるヤツがいやがったか。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_052<tab>That's it, then. We'll have to forfeit the contest.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_052<tab>ぼ、ぼっちゃま……
これでは、もう模擬戦を戦えません……。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_053<tab>Nay, my dear. There is yet time to remedy this! These efforts to confound our chances serve but to stoke the fires of my determination!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_053<tab>いいや、時間ならまだある……なんとかなるさ！
苦境に追い込まれて、逆に燃えてきた……！
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_054<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、工房に来てくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_055<tab>Rostnsthal! Joye! Lead your fellow machinists to the tourney field, and don you masks of supreme confidence. Whilst our mysterious enemy is distracted by your show of bravado, I shall work to replace the damaged firearms.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_055<tab>指南役とジョイは、「機工士」たちと模擬戦の会場へ！
自信たっぷりに振る舞って、敵の目を引きつけてくれ。
この隙に、残りの銃をでっち上げる！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_056<tab>B-But, how can you craft so many weapons afore the contest begins!?
target: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_JOYE_000_056<tab>お言葉ですが、間に合うのですか！？

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_057<tab>The short of it is: I cannot. Not to my usual exacting specifications, of course. Only the four of us must be aware of the poor quality of our replacements.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_057<tab>……間に合わない、まともに作ればな。
性能はともかく、どうにか撃てる銃をかき集める。
でも、これはここにいる4人の秘密だ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_058<tab>You and Joye must needs fight that much harder, to compensate for your colleagues' lack of firepower.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_058<tab>ポンコツ銃を持たされた「機工士」たちの分まで、
君とジョイが、がんばるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_CELESTAUX_000_060<tab>I'll do me best to keep the others in high spirits, too, Lord Stephanivien. Me apologies─I wasn't tryin' to eavesdrop or nothin', but when I heard the noise...
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_CELESTAUX_000_060<tab>ボン……あっしも、フォローに回ります。
ヤバい話が、聞こえちまったもんでね。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_061<tab>Ah, Celestaux... Well, there's naught for it, now. Welcome to the conspiracy.
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_061<tab>……セレストか、情報収集が得意なだけあるな。
では君も、よろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_062<tab>Formidable foes. Meager chance of success. This shall be a victory worthy of song!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_062<tab>状況は最悪だが……。
この模擬戦に、必ず勝とう！

source: TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_070<tab>Would that the odds were not so heavily stacked against us, but we cannot let a few setbacks stand in the way of our moment of glory!
target:
TEXT_JOBMCH500_01703_STEPHANIVIEN_000_070<tab>まさか、こんな状況で模擬戦に臨むことになるとは……。
模擬戦での勝利が、ますます君の肩にのしかかってしまうが、
よろしく頼む……。
